title: Requests to have uneaten food wrapped
context: Ask the server for a box to take your leftover food home.

content.bestLine: Can I get a box for my leftovers?

neutral.text: Can I get a to-go box?
I'd like to take my leftovers home.
Can you wrap up my remaining food?
I'll take the rest to go.
Can I have a container for my leftovers?
I'd like a box for my uneaten food.
Can you box up my leftovers?
I'll need a to-go box, please.

informal.text: Can I get a doggy bag?
I'm gonna take this to go.
Can you throw my leftovers in a box?
I'll just take the rest home.
Can I grab a to-go container?
I'm not done, can I take it with me?
Can you wrap this up for me?
I'll take my leftovers to go, thanks.

formal.text: I would appreciate a box for my leftovers.
Could you please provide a container for my uneaten food?
I would like to take my remaining food with me.
Could I have a to-go box, please?
I would appreciate it if you could wrap up my leftovers.
May I have a box for my leftovers, please?

patterns.template: Can I get a [option] for my leftovers?
patterns.meaning: Requesting a container for leftover food
Requesting to take leftover food home

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Can I get a box for my leftovers?

lines.speaker: Server
lines.text: Absolutely, I'll get you a to-go box.

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: I'd like to take my leftovers home.

lines.speaker: Server
lines.text: Okay, I'll wrap it up for you.
